fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e3

Class ComponentSimulationArchitectures

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e3.ComponentSimulationArchitectures

  • public abstract class ComponentSimulationArchitectures
extends java.lang.Object
    The class ComponentSimulationArchitectures defines the global component simulation architectures for the whole HEM application.

      • createComponentSimulationArchitectures

        public static fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.plugins.devs.architectures.RTComponentModelArchitecture createComponentSimulationArchitectures(java.lang.String architectureURI,
                                                                                                                                            java.lang.String rootModelURI,
                                                                                                                                            java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit simulatedTimeUnit,
                                                                                                                                            double accelerationFactor)
                                                                                                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        create the global SIL real time component simulation architecture for the HEM application.

        Contract

         pre     architectureURI != null && !architectureURI.isEmpty()
 pre     rootModelURI != null && !rootModelURI.isEmpty()
 pre     simulatedTimeUnit != null
 pre     accelerationFactor > 0.0
 post    return != null
 post  return.getArchitectureURI().equals(architectureURI)
 post    return.getRootModelURI().equals(rootModelURI)
 post    return.getSimulationTimeUnit().equals(simulatedTimeUnit)
        Parameters:
        architectureURI - URI of the component model architecture to be created.
        rootModelURI - URI of the root model in the simulation architecture.
        simulatedTimeUnit - simulated time unit used in the architecture.
        accelerationFactor - acceleration factor for this run.
        Returns:
        the global SIL real time simulation architecture for the HEM application.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
